templates.content: You can give us a call at 888-837-8892 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.
templates.name: Phone support

templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/francosarto/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/FrancoSarto

templates.content: The best way to handle this is to contact us via this link: http://francosarto.custhelp.com/app/ask or give us a call at 888-837-8892. Our team is happy to help!
templates.name: Customer support

templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-2 business days and we usually ship via USPS or FedEx. Once shipped, economy shipping will take 5-15 business days, ground shipping will arrive in 3-7 business days, 2nd-day shipping will arrive in 2-3 business days, and next-day shipping will arrive in 1-2 business days.
templates.name: Shipping time

templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.francosarto.com/customer-service/returns-and-exchanges?icid=Footer_CustomerService_Returns
templates.name: Return policy

templates.content: Can I have your full name, email, order number, phone number and your zip code please?
templates.name: Escalation template

templates.content: You can start your return here: https://francosarto.happyreturns.com/
templates.name: How do I start a return?

templates.content: I'm afraid we cannot deliver to military APO/FPO addresses.
templates.name: Do you ship to APO/FPO addresses?

templates.content: We're happy to offer economy shipping to P.O. boxes. Ground and expedited shipping options to P.O. boxes are not available at this time.
templates.name: Do you ship to PO Boxes?

templates.content: I'm afraid we ship only to U.S. addresses at this time.
templates.name: Do you offer international shipping?

templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! Our shoes generally run true to size. Would you mind sharing your usual size?
templates.name: Sizing

templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.
templates.name: Store location / retailer

templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.francosarto.com/sale?icid=TopNav_Sale

templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $89+ before taxes, excluding Alaska and Hawaii. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?
